GSP29vnyps52u:2: nyā. pa. prame. 9 atra yadyapi pramāviṣayaḥ prameyamiti vyutpattyā āropitākāravyavacchedārthayā anāropitarūpaṃ sarvaṃ prameyam, tathāpi niḥśreyasāntaraṅgatayā tadarthibhiḥ prakarṣeṇa meyaṃ prameyamiha vivakṣim
GSP29vnyps52u:3: yadviṣayeṇa bhrameṇa saṃsarāmaḥ, yadviṣayeṇa ca tattvajñānenāpavarjyemahi,
GSP29vnyps52u:11: yaccaitanyasamānādhikaraṇaṃ yadapṛthaksiddhaṃ yaddravyaṃ, tat tasya śarīram /
GSP29vnyps52u:18: te ca śabdādayo guṇāḥ tadviśiṣṭāni ca /
GSP29vnyps52u:28: tatra sukhatatsādhanādikamapi viṣasaṃpṛktamadhuvat prabhūtānarthānuṣaṅgitvād duḥkhameva mumukṣuṇā bhāvyamiti tasyāpi pratikūlavedanīyatvam /
GSP29vnyps52u:32: etadeva ca prameyaṃ saṃgrahāccaturdhā vibhajya kecidanusaṃdadhate---
GSP29vnyps52u:34: ye tu kaṇacaraṇādayaḥ ṣaṭsaptādirūpeṇa sarvān padārthān vibhajya
GSP29vnyps52u:38: tatrāpi karmaṇaḥ saṃpratipannaguṇātiriktatvapakṣepi saṃskārādiguṇāvāntaraviśeṣavad guṇapakṣakakṣīkārāt dvau padārthau /
GSP29vnyps52u:39: tatra ca guṇaśabdasyāpṛthaksiddhaviśeṣaṇamātravyutpannasya tathāvidheṣu keṣucid dravyeṣvapi vṛtterdravyaguṇarūpeṇa vibhāgānaucityād dravyamadravyamityeva padārthavibhāgamādriyāmaher, idṛśasya tu vicārasyāpavarge paraṃparayopayogaḥ /
GSP29vnyps52u:40: mumukṣūṇāṃ pradhānatamaṃ tu prameyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ brahmaikameveti manvāno bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ--- "athāto brahmajijñāsā" ityupakramya tadeva saprakāraṃ nirūpitavān; tatprakāratayaivānyat prameyam /
GSP29vnyps52u:41: kecittu dehātmavivekakramānusāreṇa "bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā"
GSP29vnyps52u:42: iti śrutiprakriyayā ca tridhā tattvaṃ vibhajya cintayanti, tatrāpi saprakāradravyacintanādadravyacintāpyantarbhavati
GSP29vnyps52u:44: tadabhiprāyeṇa kālasya padārthaviśeṣaṇatayaiva samastavastupratītyantarbhāvānna pṛthagastitvādayo vaktavyāḥ, na ca parihartavyāḥ /
GSP29vnyps52u:46: jātyādyastitvanāstitvavyavahāratulyaḥ" iti jainanirākaraṇasamaye bhāṣyakārairuktamātataśca brahmaikameva tattvamiti vā cidacidīśvarabhedena trīṇi tattvānīti vā paśyatāṃ na kaśvidviśeṣaḥ, svarūpabhedasya viśiṣṭaikyasya cobhayeṣāmabhimatatvāt /
GSP29vnyps52u:49: ityādyanusāreṇa caturdhā pañcadhā vā vibhajya cintayatāṃ kāryaviśeṣaiḥ saha pañcaṣaṭsaptaviṃśatyādisaṃkhyāṃ niveśayatāṃ ca pūrvāviśeṣa eva /
GSP29vnyps52u:53: prāpyam, prāptā, prāptyupāyaḥ, nivartyaṃ, phalaṃ ceti kecit pañcadhā prameyaṃ parisaṃcakṣate
GSP29vnyps52u:55: nyā. pa. prame. 10 athāyamaparaḥ pravṛttyarthaḥ saṃgrahonuṣṭhānaparihārāntaraṅgaḥ; tathāhi--- hitamahitaṃ ca prakarṣeṇa
GSP29vnyps52u:63: nanvabhicārādikarmaṇāmanarthahetūnāṃ kṣudrapuruṣārthasādhanānāṃ ca kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kathaṃ hitatvam ?; ucyate---adhikāriviśeṣamapekṣya hi sarvo vidhirniṣedhaśca; yathoktam--- "traiguṇyaviṣayā vedāḥ" iti /
GSP29vnyps52u:64: yo hi sukhaṃ duḥkhanivṛttiṃ cecchati tasya tatsādhanamapekṣamāṇasya laukikeṣu sādhaneṣu pravṛttasya teṣāṃ nirayādihetubhūtānarthahetutvena tatparihārāyānarthahetutvarahitāḥ sukhādyupāyāḥ pratipādyante evaṃ kāmyakarmāṇi pāralaukikāni dṛṣṭajātīyatadadhikaphalārthatayā dṛṣṭānarthāvahasukhapravṛttipratibandhaupayikatvād hitānyeva rāgiṇām /
GSP29vnyps52u:70: sopi hi kvacidavaśyakartavya eva, "ṣaṭsvanabhicaran patet" ityādidarśanāt
GSP29vnyps52u:71: ataśca mumukṣorapi rakṣakakṣatriyādyabhāve rākṣasādyabhibhave cātmarakṣaṇārthamabhicāraḥ kartavya eva, "sarvata evātmānaṃ gopāyet" iti
GSP29vnyps52u:74: pāralaukikāni tu tatphalābhisaṃdhiviraheṇa karmayogānuṣṭhānadaśāyāṃ nityanaimittikairekīkṛtya kartavyāni /
GSP29vnyps52u:79: ata eva hi smaranti--- "śāstraṃ hi vatsalataraṃ mātāpitṛsahasrataḥ" iti /
GSP29vnyps52u:80: evaṃ sthite pravāhānādisāmagrīcakravaśādaniyatasamayasamāgatasakalasaiddhāntikasamālambanīyasucar itaparipākanivṛttapratibandhaparamapuruṣakaṭākṣaviśeṣasamunmiṣitasattvasāmarthyena karatalāmalakavadālokitaheyopādeyavibhāgasyānādyanantabahuvidhadurviṣahaduḥkhānuṣaṅgadūṣitālpāsthirasāṃsārikasukhamayaviṣamadhuviraktasya samastaduritavargāpavargāyamāṇanityaniratiśayānandamukundacaraṇāravindasevāmakarandalampaṭasya yathāśakti varṇāśramocitanityanaimittikaniṣiddhaparihārasahakṛtaṃ darśanasamānākāradhruvānusmṛtirūpaṃ bhagavadupāsanaṃ hitatamaṃ vihitam /
GSP29vnyps52u:83: ayameva ca paramo yogastrayyantānuvidhāyiṣu sarveṣu mokṣaśāstreṣu
GSP29vnyps52u:84: pratipādyate; yathāha bhagavān parāśaraḥ--- "ātmaprayatnasāpekṣā viśiṣṭā yā manogatiḥ /
GSP29vnyps52u:87: smarati ca bhagavān śāṇḍilyarḥ--- "idṛśaḥ paramātmāyaṃ pratyagātmāva tathedṛśaḥ /
GSP29vnyps52u:96: soyamevaṃvidhaḥ paramayogākhyo dharmaḥ "mayyeva mana ādhatsva" iti gīyate /
GSP29vnyps52u:97: tadaśaktasya, "atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram /
GSP29vnyps52u:101: yaḥ prītipūrvabhagavadasādhāraṇakarmaṇyapi na samarthaḥ, tasya viṣayarasavaimukhyajananāya
GSP29vnyps52u:105: tena tatra siddhādhikārasyāpi śiṣṭatayā vyapadeśyasyāntargatātmajñānaḥ karmayoga eva kāryaḥ
GSP29vnyps52u:107: tādṛśenaiva ca karmayogena sukaratvādiguṇavatā cirataramanuṣṭhitena jñānayogavyavadhānamantareṇāpyātmāvalokanaṃ sidhyati /
GSP29vnyps52u:113: sarveṣu cāmīṣu parvasu tattatsāmagrīcakraghaṭanāya tattatphalapradānāya ca sa eva hi śaraṇamanusaraṇīyaḥ
GSP29vnyps52u:114: tathā cāmananti--- "sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ" iti /
GSP29vnyps52u:119: anyeṣāṃ tu dehavicchedamātrasahasrayuvatisaṃbhogasamastālīkaviṣayavijñānasaṃtānocchedavāsanātyantavirāmaviṣayoparāgavaidhuryanityordhvagamanasakalalokamastakopariniviṣṭasādhāraṇadehaviśeṣānupraveśanirāvaraṇatvasvānandānubhavasvātantryalābhaśivasārūpyaśivāpatticicchaktipariśeṣāvidyānivṛttyupādhinivṛttisakalavaiśeṣikaguṇocchedaprabhṛtayo niḥśreyasavikalpā dehādyatiriktātmasadbhāvabāhyārthapāramārthikatvatattadāgamāprāmāṇyabrahmanirvikāratvanirdeṣatvatajjñānānandanityatvādisamarthakaiḥ śārīrakaparyantaiḥ śāstraiḥ pratikṣepyā; iti tatra tatra vistaro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP29vnyps52u:120: iha tu pramāṇacintāyāḥ paramaprayojanaṃ darśayituṃ prameyasya
GSP29vnyps52u:123: nyā. pa. prame. 11 svātantryeṇa mitaṃ sukhetaratayā yadbhāti jantoridaṃ sarvaṃ yasya vibhūtirivyavasitaṃ svādaṃ vyanakti svakam /
GSP29vnyps52u:126: yatrodāsata jaiminiprabhṛtayaḥ śrutyarthacintāparāḥ yasyāṃ kandalayanti mandamatayaḥ pāriplavān viplavān /
GSP29vnyps52u:127: viśveṣāmiha veṅkaṭeśaviduṣā viśrāntaye vādināṃ prācī nītiṣu paryaśodhi saraṇiḥ pracchāyaniṣkaṇṭakā
GSP29vnyps52u:128: śuddhiṃ bibhrati mādṛśāṃ bhaṇitayaścūḍānvaye kevalaṃ prānte miśramabhāṇi nītinipuṇaiḥ kiṃ teṣvamantavyatā /
GSP29vnyps52u:132: ratiṃ bhajati bhāvanā layamivopayāti drutaṃ ramāvasumatīsahācaritadharmaṇi brahmaṇi //
GSP29vnyps52u:133: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau prameyādhyāye dvitīyamāhnikam //
